title: Donation History Import Guide
description: Setup and Impact on Platform Features
body:
Why This Matters

  • 3x Higher Adoption: Organizations with properly structured donation data see significantly better gift officer engagement

  • Better Scoring: Complete donation history leads to more accurate prospect identification

  • Avoid Limitations: Poor data structure can restrict portfolio management capabilities

Before You Start

Prerequisites:

Essential Data Fields

Optional Fields

Data Preparation

Solicitor Names

  • Use full, consistent names ("John Smith", not "J. Smith")

  • Check for typos and variations

  • Consider using email addresses for unique identification

Date Formatting

Bulk Upload Best Practicesupload Process

  1. Navigate to Bulk Upload Best Practicesupload page

  2. Select "Donations import" (separate from bulk Understanding Your AI Scoring & Insights" blankenrichment Results" blankAI Scoring & Insightsenrichment)

  3. Bulk Upload Best Practicesupload your file

  4. Verify field mapping

  5. Confirm and process

Best Practices

  • Bulk Upload Best Practicesupload complete historical data - no practical time limits

  • Use territory codes in solicitor names for better organization

  • Consider backup solicitor assignments

  • Track special handling in Donation Notes
